import React from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; class Checkout extends React.Component { state = { cart: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) || [], fullname: '', cpf: '', email: '', phone: '', cep: '', address: '', payment: '', buttonDisabled: true, }; onChange = ({ target }) => { const { name, value } = target; this.setState({ [name]: value }, this.validateButton); }; validateButton = () => { const { fullname, email, cpf, phone, cep, address, payment } = this.state; const validation = ( fullname.length > 0 && cpf.length > 0 && phone.length > 0 && cep.length > 0 && address.length > 0 && payment !== '' && (/^[\w-.]+@([\w-]+\.)+[\w-]{2,4}$/g).test(email) ); this.setState({ buttonDisabled: !validation }); }; clearCart = () => { localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify([])); this.setState({ cart: [], fullname: '', cpf: '', email: '', phone: '', cep: '', address: '', payment: '', }); }; render() { const { cart } = this.state; const { fullname, email, cpf, phone, cep, address, buttonDisabled } = this.state; const totalPrice = cart .reduce((acc, curr) => acc + (curr.price * curr.quantity), 0).toFixed(2); return ( <>
